column2: A quick and easy stir-fried kale side dish. Drizzle over a glug of the lemon tahini dressing for a flavourful and fresh way to get your greens
Quick, easy and packed with healthy veg, this is a great midweek meal for vegans and veggies
Make your own tahini using black or white sesame seeds, this recipe shows you how. Black ones have a nuttier, sweeter flavour, making them perfect for baking
Pep up your porridge with a tahini drizzle and toasted sesame seeds. Oats and tahini help to promote good digestion so you can start your day the healthy way
Try tahini as a secret ingredient in banana cake – it works brilliantly. Decorate it with our tahini buttercream topping and chocolate chips...
Indulge in a melty feta toastie, with nutty tahini and a drizzle of honey. This is irresistible quick comfort food you can make in just ten minutes
Combine meringue, cream, tahini, bananas and salted caramel to make this quick dessert that's a twist on Eton mess. It's the perfect no-cook pudding for summer...
This light coleslaw swaps mayonnaise for yogurt and tahini paste to make a low fat, super healthy side dish - perfect for a BBQ
Serve this thick, moreish dip of roasted courgettes and Greek yogurt with crudités or flatbread as part of a Lebanese meze spread
This colourful fish supper is ready in just half an hour, served on a bed of couscous with crunchy cucumber and pomegranate seeds
This thick and creamy Greek sauce is almost like a dip - serve with slow-cooked meats, roasted vegetables, or chunks of bread for dipping

column1: Cumin roast veg with tahini dressing
column2: Get all five of your 5-a-day in one super-healthy packed lunch, bursting with nutrients including calcium, folate, fibre, vitamin C and iron

column1: Spiced lamb with bulgur & tahini dressing
column2: Flavour lamb mince with cumin and coriander and serve on a bed of tabbouleh-style wheat with parsley, tomatoes and sesame dressing

column1: Marrakech lamb with tahini squash gratin
column2: Spice up your Sunday lunch with this Moroccan roast lamb, bursting with North African flavours - coriander, cumin, cinnamon and mint

column1: Moroccan roasted veg with tahini dressing
column2: Oven bake courgettes, peppers and aubergines, add a kick of harissa and serve with couscous salad and cool yoghurt sauce
